explanation: [0-0] A man in a blue shirt stands behind a table with three rolls of toilet paper on it - blue, yellow, and pink - along with three pieces of cardstock in corresponding colors. There is an iPhone in a box in the middle, as well as a bottle of Coca-Cola. There are also a few banknotes on the left. The table is gray and the wall in the background is white.

[0-9] The man picks up the blue toilet paper and places it on the blue construction paper. The subtitle "Joer" appears in the upper left corner. Then he picks up the pink toilet paper roll and places it on the yellow cardstock. Subsequently, he picks up the yellow toilet paper roll and places it on the pink cardstock. Immediately afterwards, he takes off his blindfold, glances at the Coke on the right, and picks it up.
